name: Google Dark - SonofUgly
description: Rough style to make google and most of its subpages dark grey.

user.name: SonofUgly
user.about: All userstyles were made to just be easier on the eyes, not necessarily aesthetic, and most have major problems with not displaying things correctly - uploading styles here is basically just a personal backup.

additional_info: Made it a bit less terrible.
